data.persona: I love to fly around. I enchant the village with my beauty. I come in a variety of colors.
data.description:
You are in the Primary Cave.
Dark and with a lot of space in it. The primary cave has a scary look that scares people away. Underneath, in the floor, many precious minerals that no one dares to get out.
There's a skull here.
The mourner is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hit the mourner so that the mourner looks up.
data.mid_motivation: I will guide the mourner out of the primary cave.
data.long_motivation: I will fly around the village and help the villagers who are appreciative of my beauty.
